Name: Hackathon
Descriptions: Put on your thinking caps for a day and code away. Find an executable solution for the given problem and the best one wins the prize.
Rules: Topic for the event: FLOOD DISASTER IN KERALA
A team will consist of minimum of 1 and a maximum of 4 members
Cross college teams are allowed
Each team should bring their own laptops
Any number of teams from a single college will be allowed to enroll for this contest
The problem statement will be published on the website 3 weeks prior to the day of the contest
The drafts must be submitted to the email (hackathon@dyuksha.org) on or before 31 October 2018 23:59 and the registration will be closed on the same.(the more you wait the lesser time you get)
The best drafts will be selected and the selected groups will be notified by email as and when they are selected.
If youʼre confident with your draft you can start working on your product even before the results are published
The teams will have to settle at the alloted venue (If Selected will be on your E-mail) at 10:00 am and they have to continue their work or polish it.
Selected Teams must have a Presentation (Max 5min) ready
12:00 - 15:00 : Polish your work - There'll be a Surprise waiting
15:00 – 17:00 : Presentation
The teams are allowed to use their favourite framework.
Judging Criteria: Technology Used, Aesthetics, Efficiency, Completion, Presentation Skills
Any Plagiarism noticed by the organisers will result in immediate disqualification
All students with a valid identity card from their respective educational institution and a valid DYUKSHA ID are eligible to participate in the event
Decision of organizers will be ﬁnal and binding on all
The organizers have full rights to call off the event if the required number of entries are not met, if that is the case the registered participants will be informed at the earliest
Change in rules, if any will be highlighted on the website and notiﬁed to the registered teams
